title: Firefly_Complete_Collection
description:
This is all I have found about the TV-show Firefly. It only got one season, but should have gotten so many more.

Anyway, this is the TV-show, the movie, the comic book and the soundtrack from the TV-show.

I advise you to look at it in this order: TV-show, comic book, movie. That fits the timeline.

There are no subtitles because I don&#039;t know how to sync them to the video, and that&#039;s even worse than not understanding the Asian (japanese?) profanities in the show.

I will seed this to 400% and that&#039;s it. Got too slow a line and too much to share to keep it alive for longer than that.

Hope you enjoy it as much as I do, especially the theme song on the TV-show.
